title: Progress on Paddy Purchasing  Programme in 2011 Yala Season
decision_details:
- Cabinet noted the progress of the programme of purchasing paddy in the Yala Season 2011, presented by Hon. Johnston Fernando, Minister of Co-operatives and Internal Trade, giving the following details totaling to 50,445 MT. as at 14.09.2011: 
	
		*	Polonnaruwa Zone		-	        21,366  MT 
		*	Wayamba Zone		-	         	3726  MT
		*	Ampara Zone		-	         10,171 MT
		*	Anuradhapura Zone		-		 6383 MT
		*	Southern Zone		-		 4757 MT
		*	Northern Zone		-		   221 MT
		*	Eastern Zone			-		 3820 MT
